meanings.definition: The long flat bone in the middle of the front of the chest.
meanings.sent1: Her doctor gently pressed on her breastbones to check for any tenderness.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon carefully avoided the breastbones while performing the operation.
meanings.sent3: During the dance, he joked that his breastbones were the secret to his graceful moves.
meanings.sent4: The old tree's roots spread out like breastbones grasping the earth.
meanings.sent5: The knight's armor protected his breastbones in battle.
